sql: SELECT    fa.receivedate,     fa.typecode     INTO    :applicationRecievedDate,    :programCode   FROM    caseheader              ch    INNER JOIN bdmforeignapplication   fa ON ch.caseid = fa.caseid                                           AND ch.casetypecode = 'CT5'                                           AND ch.statuscode = 'CS4'                                           AND ( fa.typecode = 'FATYP01'                                                 OR fa.typecode = 'FATYP03' )                                            AND fa.status <> 'FASTTS04'    WHERE     ch.concernroleid = :concernRoleID
